svg.title: Test Oracle Decision Matrix - AI-Powered Oracle Selection Framework
svg.desc: Interactive decision matrix for selecting appropriate test oracles based on code complexity and validation requirements. Features 5x5 matrix with oracle types from simple assertions to AI-generated oracles, AI recommendation engine with 89% accuracy, complexity analyzer, and implementation preview showing real-time oracle selection with under 100ms response time.
